Cortex Client class API¶

This class is allow you to upload the SNAPSHOTS data to the server

Client¶

class client.Client(host='127.0.0.1', port=8000, path='./sample.mind.gz')¶

start connection to some desination (host, port)

get_param(is_contain)¶

prepare the query param for url request

post(data, is_contain, destination=None)¶

post request data tqo the desiered url
